Ora has become my favorite tool for project management. The app is just a wrapper for the website, which is fine. There are some minor bugs here and there, but these are mostly visual and haven't affected the functionality in any way for me.

description: Only works with an account and your data on their server.

description: Couldn't figure out how to make a simple Gannt Diagram after using this for 5 minutes so I uninstalled. Maybe it's a good piece of software?
I found its bit complex when my first experience but after few days I tried to explore and figure out how it works! wow! this is amazing now i can't live without it!

Ora.pm is one of those products that you can love. Efficient, easy to use, honest and delivers value. I always use it in my projects and recommend it to teams and companies that need to manage tasks in a modern way. (And despite so many compliments, I have no relationship with the company other than the customer.)

I switched to Ora from ClickUp after they offered me a deal I couldn't refuse and I'm loving the simplicity and ease-of-use compared to ClickUp. If you're looking for a straightforward, yet powerful project management platform, you can't go wrong with Ora!
Task count is not showing in the outline of the project. It projects irrelevant number. Synchronization Problem!

I think this is what I was looking for, awesome tool for project management and works like a charm

Actually I like this app, and I appreciate its logic, but I tried to use in China, not smoothly even sometimes I need to use throught VPN. So please consider to take care the users who stay in China, THX!
summary: It's Good, but not perfect in China

description: Will not use anyting else. Love it.
Just found this on snap store and install it immediately. So impressed with its beautiful UI, great UX and even so many features inside! I use Ubuntu 22.04 and it works fine

Features and idea really good. Implementation really bad. The app is full of bugs. Calendar bugs, tasks bugs, freezes. Launch bugs, memory leaks bugs. I have used the app for about 4 months, and it was nightmare every time I open the app from the system tray where was minimized. Always some new bug. The export feature is stuppid and the support has bad attitude. Don't know what more to say. It is better using simple google sheet, than this sh.. .
Annoying tutorial popups, advanced features are premium only. Account mandatory.

Excelente aplicación para el manejo de scrum y otras metodologías Agile.
Genial para gestionar proyectos de software o estudio de la ingeniería de software!
Lo instalé pero nunca pude usarlo, nunca abrió. es una pena.

Limita casi todas sus funciones en la versión básica. Encontré herramientas más completas online. Una pena que no ofrezcan una mejor base. Solo permite crear epics, pero al intentar crear subtareas del tipo features ya no se puede avanzar. Muy mal!
summary: Limita casi todas sus funciones en la versión básica
